long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Black and White  is a mesmerizing puzzle adventure that transcends the boundaries of color to challenge your perception and logic. In this captivating mobile game, players are immersed in a world where hues fade away, leaving only shades of black and white.

At its core, The Black and White is a test of your spatial awareness and strategic thinking. Each level presents a unique grid filled with black and white tiles, and your objective is simple: navigate through the monochromatic maze to reach the goal.
